attributes.title: 2020 Volkswagen Polo GTI 1.8 TSI Auto

attributes.description: Low mileage 300C's are becoming difficult to find, full service history examples even less so. This is a 2 mature owners from new car. The Hemi is also a scarcity, just look how many are being currently offered and you will understand. The last owner was meticulous with maintenance, changing the oil every 5000 kms. Its a tremendous amount of performance and value at this level. Remember that this engine has that clever function of only working on half the cylinders at low speed. The vehicle came straight from the agents workshop onto the floor for sale.
